title: Create registry schema and migration
description: Create ~/.config/ralphtools/registry.json as single source of truth for projects, MCPs, and secrets. Migrate existing projects.json + shared-project-mcps.json into unified format. See docs/plans/2026-01-23-centralized-mcp-registry.md for schema.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Migration preserves all existing project data from projects.json
Migration imports MCPs from shared-project-mcps.json into global.mcps
Registry includes version field for future migrations
